__e: You see, when Stella was murdered, I was in a motor court just outside of Clenolden. That's 100 miles away.
Lizzie's been half frightened out of her wits... and Stella's been in deadly danger twice.
Listen to me, all right? I'm tellin' you, I don't care what Stella said.
Stella and me, we have brains enough to know what's right from wrong.
Oh, he saw me talking with Stella and he jumped to a conclusion.
In 10 days we'll see Stella on the street
